detaileddescription.para:
Description type of Test requirements, interface, input-output-correlation, boundary-value analysis, equivalence partitioning
Additional description: Verifies: ZV_InitVarFunc

N/A
N/A
Tests the start of the module The test technique involves: requirements test, interface, input-output-correlation, boundary-value analysis, equivalence partitioning Step 1: Tests the start of the module
procedure: Call ZV_InitVarFunc without any parameters
test result: ZV_boRun is set to 1

Description type of Test requirements, interface, input-output-correlation, boundary-value analysis, equivalence partitioning
Additional description: Verifies: ZV_Start

N/A
N/A
Tests the start of the module The test technique involves: requirements test, interface, input-output-correlation, boundary-value analysis, equivalence partitioning Step 1: Tests the start of the module
procedure: Call ZV_Start without any parameters

Description type of Test requirements, interface, input-output-correlation, boundary-value analysis, equivalence partitioning
Additional description: Verifies: ZV_Stop

N/A
N/A
Tests the stop of the module The test technique involves: requirements test, interface, input-output-correlation, boundary-value analysis, equivalence partitioning Step 1: Tests the start of the module
procedure: Call ZV_Stop without any parameters
test result: ZV_boRun is set to 0

Description type of Test requirements, interface, input-output-correlation, boundary-value analysis, equivalence partitioning
Additional description: Verifies: ZV_TaskCyclicEvent

N/A
N/A
Tests the cyclic event of the module The test technique involves: requirements test, interface, input-output-correlation, boundary-value analysis, equivalence partitioning Step 1: Tests the cyclic event if ZV_boRun is 0
procedure: set ZV_boRun to 0
procedure: Call ZV_TaskCyclicEvent with the following parameters: 0
test result: all of the following functions are called once: ZV_Prepare_RteBuffer, ZVAD_TaskCyclicEvent, ZV_PreAllRunnablesHook, cyclic_zv,ZV_PostAllRunnablesHook, ZV_ExtendFrontLeft, ZV_ExtendFrontRight, ZV_ExtendRearLeft, ZV_ExtendRearRight, ZV_ExtendSpgAnklappen

Step 2: Tests the cyclic event if ZV_boRun is 1
procedure: set ZV_boRun to 1
procedure: Call ZV_TaskCyclicEvent with the following parameters: 0
test result: none of the following functions are called: ZV_Prepare_RteBuffer, ZVAD_TaskCyclicEvent, ZV_PreAllRunnablesHook, cyclic_zv,ZV_PostAllRunnablesHook, ZV_ExtendFrontLeft, ZV_ExtendFrontRight, ZV_ExtendRearLeft, ZV_ExtendRearRight, ZV_ExtendSpgAnklappen

Description type of Test requirements, interface, input-output-correlation, boundary-value analysis, equivalence partitioning
Additional description: Verifies: ZV_ExtendFrontLeft

N/A
N/A
Tests if ZV_ExtendFrontLeft extends the signals SollTueren_evFTVerrSoll, SollTueren_evFTEntrSoll The test technique involves: requirements test, interface, input-output-correlation, boundary-value analysis, equivalence partitioning Step 1: Tests if output SollTueren_evFTVerrSoll, SollTueren_evFTEntrSoll are 0 when input SollTueren_evFTVerrSoll, SollTueren_evFTEntrSoll is 0
procedure: Set ZV_DES_SollTueren_evFTVerrSoll.value to 0
procedure: Set ZV_DES_SollTueren_evFTEntrSoll.value to 0
procedure: Call ZV_ExtendFrontLeft
test result: Expect params: Rte_Write_ZV_SollTueren_evFTVerrSollCan(0)
test result: Expect params: Rte_Write_ZV_SollTueren_evFTEntrSollCan(0)

Step 2: Tests if output SollTueren_evFTVerrSoll is 1 when input SollTueren_evFTVerrSoll is switched from 0 to 1
procedure: Set ZV_DES_SollTueren_evFTVerrSoll.value to 0
procedure: Set ZV_DES_SollTueren_evFTEntrSoll.value to 0
procedure: Call ZV_ExtendFrontLeft
procedure: Set ZV_DES_SollTueren_evFTVerrSoll.value to 1
procedure: do this 22 times:
procedure: Call ZV_ExtendFrontLeft
test result: Expect params: Rte_Write_ZV_SollTueren_evFTVerrSollCan(1)
test result: Expect params: Rte_Write_ZV_SollTueren_evFTEntrSollCan(0)
procedure: Call ZV_ExtendFrontLeft
test result: Expect params: Rte_Write_ZV_SollTueren_evFTVerrSollCan(0)
test result: Expect params: Rte_Write_ZV_SollTueren_evFTEntrSollCan(0)

Step 3: Tests if output SollTueren_evFTEntrSoll is 1 when input SollTueren_evFTEntrSoll is switched from 0 to 1
procedure: Set ZV_DES_SollTueren_evFTVerrSoll.value to 0
procedure: Set ZV_DES_SollTueren_evFTEntrSoll.value to 0
procedure: Call ZV_ExtendFrontLeft
procedure: Set ZV_DES_SollTueren_evFTEntrSoll.value to 1
procedure: do this 22 times:
procedure: Call ZV_ExtendFrontLeft
test result: Expect params: Rte_Write_ZV_SollTueren_evFTVerrSollCan(0)
test result: Expect params: Rte_Write_ZV_SollTueren_evFTEntrSollCan(1)
procedure: Call ZV_ExtendFrontLeft
test result: Expect params: Rte_Write_ZV_SollTueren_evFTVerrSollCan(0)
test result: Expect params: Rte_Write_ZV_SollTueren_evFTEntrSollCan(0)
